from .. import hfs

import json


[docs]class Htext:

[docs]    def process_files(self, debug, file, file_mime, h_server, client_uuid):
        # !! TODO try/catch
        f = open(file, 'rb')
        h_inst = hfs.HFs()
        # DEBUG
        if "text" in file_mime:
            j_str = json.dumps( { "payload": repr(f.read()) } )
            j_list.append(j_str)
            h_inst.format_lists(debug, j_list, h_server, client_uuid)
            j_list = []
